long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Locallocale.com

Search

Search for anything from your local pizza to national retail chains

Save

Keep all your favorite listings handy in your My Localocale.

Take advantage of coupons offered by a retailer by adding them to your account.

If you find a listing you are interested in, adding them to your account is as easy as clicking "Add Retailer".

Organize

Keep your listings organized in three distinct account; Home, Work & Play.

You can quickly switch account by selecting one from the account drop down menu.


This extension will allow you to bookmark and add the website to localocale.com

Feel free to visit and create a free localocale.com account today
